meanings.definition: The larval stage of a butterfly or moth, typically having a segmented body and numerous legs.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, we observed caterpillars crawling on the leaves.
meanings.sent2: Butterflies emerge from caterpillars after a fascinating transformation.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillars decided to have a race to see who could reach the top of the tree first.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like caterpillars, slowly growing and transforming into beautiful creations.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the caterpillars' ability to change into butterflies.

meanings.definition: A person or organization that provides food and drink for a social event or gathering.
meanings.sent1: The caterpillars for the party arrived early to set up the buffet.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillars ensured that the guests were well-fed and happy throughout the event.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillars at the picnic were so efficient that they finished setting up in record time.
meanings.sent4: The caterpillars' catering service was praised for its delicious food and excellent presentation.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillars' attention to detail made the event a memorable experience for all attendees.
